benchmark_details.name: HaluEval-Wild
benchmark_details.overview: HaluEval-Wild is designed to evaluate LLM hallucinations in real-world interactions using challenging user queries collected from ShareGPT.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Enhance understanding and improve LLM reliability in scenarios reflective of real-world interactions.
tasks: Improve model responses to challenging queries
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Focuses on challenging queries specifically designed to induce hallucinations may not fully encapsulate everyday user interactions.

data.annotation: Manually verified and categorized based on hallucination types.

methodology.interpretation: Evaluating LLM responses based on their consistency with reference answers.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Manual verification to exclude personally identifiable information (PII).
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Adheres to ethical guidelines in data collection and dissemination.
